translation.en: - Hot enough for you? - She's tried everything.
translation.es: ¿Te gusta este calor? Probó de todo.

translation.en: What about the looks she was getting…
We were all, frankly, keen on…
translation.es: La verdad, a todos nos gustaba…

translation.en: No, it's not right for a girl.
…giving you any more money to…
- Look at it this way… - It's simple to me.
I must stay away from…
Feels like the whole city is out today.
translation.es: Parece que hoy salió todo el mundo.

translation.en: Summer sales.
translation.es: Liquidación de verano. En Nueva York amamos las ofertas.

translation.en: - Can't keep a New Yorker from a bargain. - Ain't that the truth?
translation.es: Liquidación de verano. En Nueva York amamos las ofertas. Tienes mucha razón.

translation.en: Let's get to the toy store and out of this heat.
translation.es: Vamos a la juguetería, que hace calor.

translation.en: I'll never hear the end of it if I don't get my niece a doll.
translation.es: Mi sobrina me volverá loca si no le llevo una muñeca.

translation.en: She asking for some special sort? They have those ones with darling hair you can braid.
translation.es: ¿Pidió alguna en especial? Hay unas con pelo para trenzar.

translation.en: - Yes, maybe she'd like that. - Taxi!
translation.es: - Sí, quizá le guste eso. No sé. - ¡Taxi!

translation.en: - Oh. - There now, that's better.
Look at that precious little pickaninny one.
translation.es: Mira qué preciosa es esa negrita.

translation.en: - That, she'll love. - No.
She's never even met a colored who didn't work for us. Thank heavens. - - Oh.
translation.es: Solo conoce a los de color que trabajan para nosotros, por suerte.

translation.en: No, never mind, ladies. Accidents will happen.
translation.es: No, tranquilas, señoras. Fue un accidente.

translation.en: - My goodness. - Here you are.
- Here. - Oh! Thank you.
- What a nice lady. - Mm- hmm.
There you go, miss. Thank you so much.
- Thank you. - Mama, I want that one.
Do you have the Mother Goose Drawing and Tracing Book?
translation.es: ¿Tiene el libro para colorear Mamá Oca?

translation.en: All sold out.
Figures. I've tried all over town. My son won't settle for anything but.
translation.es: Me imaginaba. Busqué por todos lados. Mi hijo no acepta otro.

translation.en: Try again in a couple weeks. Might get lucky.
translation.es: Vuelva en dos semanas. Quizá tenga suerte.

translation.en: - His birthday's tomorrow. - Well, better luck next time.
translation.es: - Cumple años mañana. - Bueno, será la próxima vez.

translation.en: Thank you.
Mister? Hey, are you all right, sir?
Please, somebody, help me. I… I… Help me out.
He's fallen down. Sir, can you hear me?
Sir. Sir, you all right?
- What's happened? - I don't know.
He all right?
This heat. Feels like I'm about to pass out myself.
translation.es: Con este calor, yo también estoy a punto de desmayarme.

translation.en: Yes. I guess it's tea I need. I'm a little faint.
translation.es: Sí. Necesito un té. Estoy un poco mareada.

translation.en: The Drayton, ma'am? They do say as how there's always a breeze up there.
translation.es: ¿La llevo al Drayton? Dicen que siempre está fresco ahí.

translation.en: - The Drayton would be lovely. -
Oh! Taxi!
Take him to a hospital.
Thank you.
- Good afternoon. - Good afternoon.
The waiter will be with you.
Stop it.
- Now? - Yes, now.
You satisfied?
Come here.
See you later.
Don't be long. I'll get another one.
I won't. I hope.
- You'll be all right? - I'll be just fine.
I'm going to sit here and enjoy this cool room.
translation.es: Me quedaré aquí, disfrutando del fresco.

translation.en: - All right. - All right.
- I suppose I should… - I suppose you should.
We'll be married soon.
As far as they know, we are.
Pardon me. I don't mean to stare, but I think I know you.
translation.es: Discúlpeme, no quise mirarla así, pero creo que la conozco.

translation.en: I'm afraid you're mistaken.
No, of course I know you, Rene.
translation.es: No, claro que te conozco, Rene.

translation.en: You look just the same. Tell me, do they still call you Rene?
translation.es: Estás igual. Dime, ¿te siguen llamando Rene?

translation.en: Yes, though no one's called me that for a long time.
translation.es: Sí, aunque ya hace mucho que no me llaman así.

translation.en: Don't you know me?
Not really, Rene?
I'm afraid I can't seem to place…
translation.es: Disculpe, pero no la ubico de…

translation.en: - Clare? - Mm- hmm.
That's right.
- Not Clare Kendry? - Mm- hmm.
Now, don't run away.
You simply must stay and talk.
Fancy meeting you here. It's simply too lucky.
translation.es: ¡Qué casualidad verte aquí! Es una suerte.

translation.en: It's awfully surprising, yes.
I'd never have known you if you hadn't laughed.
translation.es: Te reconocí solo por tu risa.

translation.en: You've changed so. Well, it's been 12 years at least.
translation.es: - Estás muy cambiada. - Pasaron 12 años, como mínimo.

translation.en: You know, I almost dropped by your father's house not so long ago.
translation.es: Hace poco, casi paso por la casa de tu padre.

translation.en: I've thought of you so often.
translation.es: He pensado en ti muchas veces.

translation.en: - You have? - Of course.
You know, since I've been here, I've hoped I might run into someone.
translation.es: Desde que llegué, tuve la esperanza de cruzarme con alguien.

translation.en: Preferably you, though. And now you're here.
translation.es: En lo posible, contigo. Y aquí estás.

translation.en: I'll wager you haven't given me a thought.
translation.es: Apuesto a que tú no pensaste en mí.

translation.en: So…
Tell me.
I want to know everything. Married? Children?
- Yes. Two boys. You? - Mm- hmm.
One girl. Margery. She's my angel.
translation.es: Una niña. Margery. Es mi ángel.

translation.en: My husband John's here on business.
translation.es: Mi esposo, John, vino por trabajo.

translation.en: Banking business. In this heat! Can you imagine?
That was your husband?
We've been here a whole week from Chicago. That's home.
translation.es: Hace una semana vinimos de Chicago. Allí está nuestra casa.

translation.en: Although I come here and remember what home really is.
translation.es: Aunque venir aquí me recuerda cuál es mi hogar.

translation.en: Well, we can see lots of one another these days that I'm here, can't we?
translation.es: Aprovechemos para vernos mucho hasta que me vaya, ¿no?

translation.en: I don't know… I mean… I'm just…
I live in Harlem, still.
I don't come to this part of town a whole lot.
translation.es: No vengo mucho a esta zona.

translation.en: Oh, that's sad.
Perhaps I can come visit with you another time in Harlem?
translation.es: ¿Y si voy a Harlem a visitarte en otro momento?

translation.en: Meet your boys?
We're here quite often. And if this trip goes well, well, John's quite sure we'll move.
translation.es: Venimos mucho aquí. John dice que nos mudaremos si este viaje va bien.

translation.en: It's my dream to come back, Rene.
I'm sure.
Clare…
does he…
Know?
Let's go up to my suite, where we can talk properly.
translation.es: Vamos a mi suite, así hablamos tranquilas.

translation.en: Waiter!
Ugh. I can't bear this heat! I have to change.
translation.es: ¡No soporto el calor! Me tengo que cambiar.

translation.en: John'll be back soon.
And here I am, sweatin' up a storm.
translation.es: Y yo estoy sudando a mares.

translation.en: - That's nice. - Oh!
I found Gert Johnson in the phone book. Well, Gertrude Martin now.
translation.es: Hallé a Gert Johnson en la guía telefónica. Gertrude Martin.

translation.en: She married Fred. Remember?
Yes. I haven't seen Fred for an unmentionable time.
translation.es: Sí. Hace muchísimo que no veo a Fred.

translation.en: Well, they have twins. Isn't that wonderful?
- Mmm. - Boys. Oh, I'd love boys.
I'd never risk it again, though.
I went through hell those nine months for fear Margery might turn out dark.
translation.es: Tenía terror de que Margery naciera oscura.

translation.en: Mine are dark.
Oh. And your husband, he…
He… couldn't exactly pass, if that's what you mean.
translation.es: - ¿Y tu esposo es…? - Él… no puede pasar por blanco, si es lo que quieres saber.

translation.en: Oh, I thought…
Oh, well, then.
Would you?
Would you?
Well, anyway, she goes as white.
translation.es: En fin, Gert se hace pasar por blanca.

translation.en: - So, you haven't ever thought to? - What?
I'm asking if you ever thought of passing, Rene.
translation.es: Si nunca te planteaste pasar por blanca.

translation.en: No, why should I?
I mean, for convenience, occasionally, I suppose. But no.
translation.es: De vez en cuando, por comodidad, seguro. Pero no.

translation.en: I just mean I have everything I've ever wanted.
translation.es: Tengo todo lo que siempre quise.

translation.en: Except perhaps a little more money.
translation.es: Salvo un poco más de dinero, quizá.

translation.en: Of course. That's all anybody ever wants, a little more money.
translation.es: Claro. Lo que quiere todo el mundo, un poco más de dinero.

translation.en: Money's an awfully nice thing to have.
In fact, all things considered, I think it's entirely worth the price.
translation.es: Es más, pensándolo bien, vale lo que cuesta.

translation.en: I should go, Clare.
I'm not sure it's such a good idea if John…
translation.es: No es buena idea que John me…

translation.en: Oh, no, Rene, it is.
Oh, you must stay a little while longer. Oh, please say you'll stay.
translation.es: Quédate un rato más. Por favor, dime que sí.

translation.en: Hang it! I've made a mess.
Give me a second, and I'll order us some food up here.
translation.es: Dame un segundo, y pido que nos traigan comida.

translation.en: All right.
Whatcha thinking, Rene?
You're curious, is that it?
You can ask me anything. Anything you want.
What have you told him… of your family?
translation.es: ¿Qué le dijiste a él de tu familia?

translation.en: You know, I haven't had to worry as much as you'd think.
translation.es: No hizo falta que me preocupara mucho por eso.

translation.en: There were my aunts, you see. They took me in after Father died and gave me a home of sorts.
translation.es: Estaban mis tías, que me acogieron cuando murió mi padre.

translation.en: Very white, very respectable, very religious.
translation.es: Mujeres muy blancas, muy respetables, muy religiosas.

translation.en: I met John not long after,
and as soon as I turned 18 and legal, we got married and…
translation.es: y apenas cumplí los 18 y fue legal, nos casamos y…

translation.en: well, went off and left for good.
translation.es: En fin, me fui para siempre.

translation.en: And you're happy?
Of course, Rene.
As you say, I have everything I ever wanted.
translation.es: Como dijiste, tengo todo lo que siempre quise.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Clare, that was rude of me.
translation.es: Perdón. Eso fue grosero de mi parte.

translation.en: Of course you're happy.
- Look at you. -
- And your daughter? - Margery? Oh, she's divine.
John wants to put her in one of those Swiss boarding schools in the fall.
translation.es: John quiere enviarla a uno de esos internados suizos en otoño.

translation.en: I dare say she'll get quite the education. Not like anything we had.
translation.es: Recibirá una muy buena educación, a diferencia de nosotras.

translation.en: Room service, hello?
We want cakes. The most beautiful cakes you have.
translation.es: Queremos pasteles. Los más lindos que tengan.

translation.en: Tell me, what tea you got passes for French champagne?
translation.es: ¿Qué té me pueden ofrecer que parezca champaña francesa?

translation.en: Oh, I'm messing!
Yes, we'll take a pitcher of iced tea in champagne flutes.
translation.es: Sí, una jarra de té helado con copas de champaña.

translation.en: Mm- hmm. We're celebrating.
- That's enough, thank you. - Have a drop more. You've hardly had any.
translation.es: - Suficiente, gracias. - Un poquito más, casi no tomaste.

translation.en: - Nig? - John, dear!
I ran into an old, old friend of mine from school.
translation.es: Me encontré con una vieja amiga de la secundaria.

translation.en: Irene Westover. Irene, this is my husband, John Bellew.
translation.es: Irene Westover. Irene, él es mi esposo, John Bellew.

translation.en: Pleasure to meet you, Mrs. Westover.
- Actually, it's Mrs. Redfield. - Mm.
Oh, of course, I… I didn't even think to ask.
I am sorry if I've interrupted.
- Will you get me a drink, honey? - Here.
Thank you.
So, what do you say, then? To old friends?
- To old friends! - To old friends.
- Did you hear what John called me, Rene? - Oh, Clare, please.
translation.es: - ¿Oíste cómo me llamó John? - Clare, por favor.

translation.en: No, go on, tell her why.
Oh, it's silly.
When we were first married, this woman was as white as a lily.
translation.es: Cuando nos casamos, ella era blanca como un lirio.

translation.en: But as the years go by, she seems to be getting darker and darker.
translation.es: Pero van pasando los años, y se va oscureciendo.

translation.en: So I told her, If you don't look out, you'll wake up one morning
translation.es: Entonces, le advertí que, si no tiene cuidado, un día despertará

translation.en: and find that you've turned into a nigger.
translation.es: y verá que se volvió una negra.

translation.en: Yeah. She's been Nig ever since.
translation.es: Y por eso, la llamo Neg.

translation.en: That's good!
Well, it's silly.
No, that's… That's…
That's good.
My goodness, John!
After all these years, what would it matter
if you found out that I was 1 or 2% colored, hmm?
translation.es: si te enteraras de que tengo un 1 o 2 % de sangre negra?

translation.en: Well, you can turn as black as you please, as far as I'm concerned.
translation.es: Por mí, puedes oscurecerte todo lo que quieras.

translation.en: I know you're not colored.
translation.es: Yo sé que no eres una negra.

translation.en: So, you dislike Negroes, Mr. Bellew?
No, no, no, not at all. I hate them.
But not as much as Nig does, for all she's trying to turn into one.
translation.es: Pero no tanto como Neg, por más que quiera convertirse en negra.

translation.en: Why, she won't have them near her, not even as a maid.
translation.es: No quiere tenerlos cerca, ni como servidumbre.

translation.en: Isn't that true?
Have you ever known any Negroes?
No, no, but I do know people who know them.
translation.es: No, pero conozco gente que sí.

translation.en: And I read about them in the papers, of course.
translation.es: Y leo sobre ellos en los diarios, claro.

translation.en: Terrible mess. Robbing, killing.
It's sad, really.
John, Rene doesn't want to hear about your pet perversions.
translation.es: John, a Rene no le interesan las cosas que te irritan.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I didn't mean to bore you.
You live nearby?
Fairly.
It's a great city, New York. City of the future.
translation.es: Nueva York es una gran ciudad, la ciudad del futuro.

translation.en: - What line of work is your husband in? - He's a doctor.
translation.es: - ¿A qué se dedica su esposo? - Es médico.

translation.en: - That's an interesting life. - Yes. Hard. Nerve- racking too.
translation.es: - Interesante vida la del médico. - Sí. Difícil. Y tensa.

translation.en: Wife's nerves, too, I bet. All those lady patients.
translation.es: También para la esposa, ¿no? ¡Con tantas pacientes!

translation.en: John, dear, don't start! More tea, Rene?
I've taken up too much of your time already.
Oh, but we're just getting started!
- Thank you for the drink. - I'll see you out.
translation.es: - Gracias por el trago. - La acompaño.

translation.en: Rene.
- I do hope to see you soon. - Goodbye, Mrs. Redfield.
translation.es: - Espero verte pronto. - Adiós, señora Redfield.

translation.en: - Glad to have met you. - Goodbye, Clare.
- Evening, Lance. - Evening.
Where you been?
Lookin' for that darn book.
- They eat? - I think so.
I was gonna put them to bed, but…
- But you fell asleep. - Apparently.
Am I still sleeping?
Catch it!
Pass, pass.
Hey. Come here.
- I thought you nailed this already. - I forget sometimes.
translation.es: - Creí que habías aprendido. - A veces me olvido.

translation.en: All right, ten minutes.
- Catch the ball, okay? - I don't want to.
Don't lose it.
It's boring. Play with me.
Just leave me alone.
Damn!
- Caught! - Damn it!
Brian, why you gotta be creepin' around the place like that?
translation.es: Brian, ¿por qué siempre me asustas así?

translation.en: Profanity, miss!
They'll be late for school.
I'm not gonna have time to make it to my next call if I have to drop you.
translation.es: Si tengo que llevarte, no llegaré a la próxima visita.

translation.en: - Boys, come on in. - Irene?
Yes, yes, you have to come on in now.
Sorry, honey.
I was just thinking how much Junior is getting like you.
translation.es: Pensaba que Junior se parece cada vez más a ti.

translation.en: I wonder if he isn't going too fast in school.
translation.es: No sé si va muy avanzado en la escuela.

translation.en: It's easy to forget he's younger.
I wish you wouldn't be ever fretting about those boys.
translation.es: Ojalá no vivieras preocupada por esos niños.

translation.en: They are fine. They're perfectly good, strong, healthy boys.
translation.es: Están bien. Son dos niños buenos, fuertes y sanos.

translation.en: I suppose.
I'm just afraid he's picked up some queer ideas about things from some of the older boys.
translation.es: Temo que los niños mayores le metan ideas raras en la cabeza.

translation.en: Queer? What about?
You know, things young boys be thinking about.
translation.es: Ya sabes en qué piensan los niños.

translation.en: Ah. You mean about sex?
Yes. Jokes. Things like that.
translation.es: Sí. Chistes, ese tipo de cosas.

translation.en: If sex isn't a joke, what is it?
translation.es: Si el sexo no es un chiste, ¿qué es?

translation.en: - What is a joke? - Don't be facetious.
translation.es: - ¿Y qué es un chiste? - No te hagas el gracioso.

translation.en: You ready?
No, you go. I'll take the bus.
translation.es: No, puedes irte, tomaré el autobús.

translation.en: - Pick you up, then? - Please. From the printing office.
translation.es: - ¿Te paso a buscar? - Por favor. Por la imprenta.

translation.en: I need to see about more handbills and tickets for the dance.
translation.es: Pediré más folletos y entradas para el baile.

translation.en: They should be paying you.
It isn't charity work if they pay me for it.
translation.es: Si me pagan, no es beneficencia.

translation.en: - Go on, boys. - Are we ready?
Lickety- split!
- Come back. - Are you ready?
- I'm fast. - Let's go.
- Go on, boys, get. - Junior.
- I don't wanna go! - You have to, I'm afraid.
Bye, Mama.
- I'm too fast! Can't catch me. - Get back here.
- You want grapefruit, ma'am? - Mm- hmm.
Thank you.
Ugh, my hat.
Oh, Ms. Redfield, you forgot one.
Thank you.
- Do you want me to drive? - Mmm.
Yeah, sure.
Everything set?
We're a month away and all the bookings are gone, not counting the door.
translation.es: Falta un mes y ya no hay entradas, salvo las de la puerta.

translation.en: - Busy as a cat with fleas myself. - Ain't you cold?
translation.es: - Yo también estoy muy ocupado. - ¿No tienes frío?

translation.en: No, leave it, if you're not cold.
This city!
I think I'm beginning to hate sick people.
translation.es: Estoy empezando a odiar a los enfermos.

translation.en: Their stupid meddling families, their dirty, smelly rooms--
translation.es: Las familias entrometidas, el olor y la mugre de los cuartos…

translation.en: Come on, now. It's just a bad day.
translation.es: Por favor. Tuviste un mal día.

translation.en: You don't mean that. You're helping those sick people.
translation.es: No hablas en serio. Tú ayudas a los enfermos.

translation.en: - Let's not talk about it. - You brought it up.
translation.es: - No hablemos de eso. - Tú sacaste el tema.

translation.en: - Put the window down. - Thought you were cold.
Now I'm saying I can't breathe. Put the window down.
translation.es: Ahora me ahogo. Baja la ventanilla.

translation.en: I know you think trying somewhere else would be easier for us.
translation.es: Sé que preferirías probar suerte en otro lugar.

translation.en: South America or some such. And to a point, I agree. We should go abroad somewhere.
translation.es: En América del Sur o algo así. Y coincido. Deberíamos salir del país.

translation.en: Not for a while, of course, but when the boys leave…
translation.es: Por ahora no, pero cuando los niños se vayan…

translation.en: - We can visit Brazil. - Visit?
Or I was thinking of one of them European schools for Junior.
translation.es: O podríamos mandar a Junior a una escuela europea.

translation.en: You are going to make a mollycoddle out of that boy.
translation.es: Lo vas a convertir en un consentido.

translation.en: Ted is the one who needs your attention, not Junior,
translation.es: El que necesita tu atención es Ted,

translation.en: and you needn't think I'll let you send Junior to some nice kindergarten school
translation.es: y no vayas a creer que te dejaré mandar a Junior a una escuela fina

translation.en: 'cause he's getting a much- needed education.
translation.es: solo porque ahora aprende lo que debe saber.

translation.en: Sooner he learns about sex, the better. Certainly if he learns it's a grand joke.
translation.es: Cuanto antes sepa del sexo, mejor. Sobre todo si aprende que es un chiste.

translation.en: The greatest in the world.
- What's that supposed to mean? - Nothing.
I'm just getting a little tired of playing second fiddle
translation.es: Estoy un poco cansado de quedar en segundo plano

translation.en: to your precious Negro League, that's all.
translation.es: frente a tu preciada Liga de los Negros.

translation.en: How about a little charity for this Negro?
translation.es: ¿Y si tienes caridad con este negro?

translation.en: Come on, now. There's people looking.
What's this?
- I think it's from Clare Bellew. - Clare Bellew?
translation.es: - Creo que es de Clare Bellew. - ¿Clare Bellew?

translation.en: That woman from Chicago you told me about running into?
translation.es: ¿La mujer de Chicago con quien te encontraste?

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - You gonna see her again?
I haven't opened the letter.
- It's postmarked New York. - I know.
translation.es: - La despacharon en Nueva York. - Lo sé.

translation.en: - They must've moved here. - Brian, I'm not going to see her.
translation.es: - Deben haberse mudado aquí. - Brian, no quiero verla.

translation.en: Thought you were good friends in school.
Brian, darling, I'd have to be an idiot not to realize
translation.es: Brian, no soy tan idiota como para no ver

translation.en: if a man calls me a you- know- what, it's his fault the first time,
translation.es: que si un hombre me insulta, es su culpa la primera vez,

translation.en: but mine if I give him the opportunity to do it again.
translation.es: pero es culpa mía si le permito repetirlo.

translation.en: Sure, sure.
May I?
I am so lonely, so lonely…
Cannot help longing to be with you again.
- Don't mock her. That's not fair. - I'm just reading it.
translation.es: - No te burles. No es justo. - Solo estoy leyendo.

translation.en: Fine.
You can't know how in this pale life of mine,
translation.es: No imaginas hasta qué punto, en esta vida pálida que llevo,

translation.en: I am all the time seeing the bright pictures of that other
translation.es: se me aparecen las imágenes brillantes de esa otra vida

translation.en: that I thought I was so glad to be free of.
translation.es: que creí haber abandonado con gusto.

translation.en: Oh, come on, it's funny! She's very dramatic.
It may be, Rene dear,
that your way may be the wiser and infinitely happier one.
translation.es: que tu decisión haya sido la más sabia e infinitamente más feliz.

translation.en: I'm flattered. Wiser. As if anything could rectify the humiliation…
translation.es: Qué halago. Más sabia. Como si pudiera enmendar la humillación…

translation.en: Wait, wait, there's more.
I wouldn't feel this wild desire…
if I hadn't seen you.
That's rich.
Blaming you.
Wild desire.
Don't give her an inch.
What you so angry for anyhow?
- Husband didn't call you a-- - No, but he would've.
translation.es: - Él no te llamó… - Pero lo habría hecho.

translation.en: It amounts to the same thing.
It has, you will admit, its humorous side.
translation.es: Reconoce que tiene su lado gracioso.

translation.en: No, I won't.
It's not funny, it's revolting.
translation.es: No me da gracia, sino asco.

translation.en: Irene, leave it, huh? It's normal. They always come back.
translation.es: Irene, olvídalo. Es normal. Siempre regresan.

translation.en: They have to work hard at getting there, why would they wanna come back?
translation.es: Si se esfuerzan tanto para llegar ahí, ¿por qué regresarían?

translation.en: If I knew that, I'd know what race is.
translation.es: Si supiera eso, sabría qué es la raza.

translation.en: You'd think they'd be satisfied being white.
translation.es: Esperaría que la conformara ser blanca.

translation.en: Rot! Who's satisfied being anything?
translation.es: ¿Quién se conforma con lo que es?

translation.en: I am.
Satisfied.
I am.
- Let's go. Wait, Junior! - Come on, boys.
- Books, books. - Bye, Mama.
Bye, Mama.
- Bye. -
I got yams for tonight. Save the chicken for tomorrow.
translation.es: Para la cena traje batatas. Guarda el pollo para mañana.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
- Did you clean the boys' room already? - Not yet.
translation.es: - ¿Limpiaste el cuarto de los niños? - No.

translation.en: Well, hurry. They'll be back soon and then it'll be impossible.
translation.es: Date prisa. Están por volver, y no podrás cuando lleguen.

translation.en: Can I get you something?
No. I can get it.
Redfield residence.
Yes, hello.
It's Mr. Wentworth.
Hello. Yes, Hugh.
Oh, quite, and you?
Every single one, honest. I know…
translation.es: No me queda ni una, la verdad. Ya sé…

translation.en: Wait, I'll give mine to Bianca. I won't need it anyway.
translation.es: Espera, le dejaré la mía a Bianca, no la voy a necesitar.

translation.en: - - No, I mean it.
It was silly of me not to, I'll be so busy…
translation.es: No me di cuenta, pero estaré tan ocupada…

translation.en: Well, as long as Brian has a place to drop down now and then…
translation.es: Mientras que Brian tenga dónde sentarse de vez en cuando…

translation.en: That's nice. My love to Bianca.
Yes, I'll see to it right away. See you tomorrow, Hugh. Bye.
translation.es: Sí, enseguida me ocupo. Hasta mañana, Hugh. Adiós.

translation.en: Dear God, but aren't you lovely, Clare.
translation.es: Dios mío, qué preciosa estás, Clare.

translation.en: Didn't you mean to answer my letter, Rene?
Every day I went to that nasty little post office.
translation.es: Iba cada día a esa oficina postal mugrienta.

translation.en: They thought I was having an affair and the man had thrown me over.
translation.es: Deben haber creído que tenía un amante que me había abandonado.

translation.en: - Oh! Clare, I… - Well…
Eventually it sunk in. You hadn't written to me and didn't intend to.
translation.es: Finalmente, me di cuenta de que no tenías intención de contestar.

translation.en: I tried very hard to forget, I really did, but I couldn't.
translation.es: Me propuse olvidarlo, me esforcé, pero no pude.

translation.en: I had to know why. That's why I came here.
translation.es: Necesitaba saber por qué. Para eso vine.

translation.en: Why didn't you write to me, Rene?
You see…
Well… you see…
I can't help thinking that…
you ought not to…
ought not to come up here.
- You mean you don't want me here. - No.
translation.es: - No querías verme. - No es eso.

translation.en: What I said, you ought not to run the risk.
It's terribly foolish. You must see that, and, well…
translation.es: Tú misma debes ver que es una imprudencia y, bueno…

translation.en: just not the right thing.
Rene, you are priceless. The right thing?
translation.es: Rene, qué ridícula eres. ¿No está bien?

translation.en: - I mean, it isn't safe. - Safe?
To come up here. Considering what I saw of Mr. Bellew's attitude.
translation.es: Que vengas aquí, considerando la actitud que vi en el Sr. Bellew.

translation.en: Oh, of course, I understand.
And I don't blame you for being angry, Rene.
translation.es: Es lógico que estés enojada, Rene.

translation.en: You acted beautifully that day, really beautifully. Thank you.
translation.es: Ese día reaccionaste muy bien, verdaderamente, gracias.

translation.en: I don't want thanks.
I just mean that… it was very kind of you to be so delicate about it.
translation.es: Fue muy amable de tu parte haberlo tomado con delicadeza.

translation.en: What other option did I have, Clare?
I have been furious at you, really furious.
- Putting me in that position. - Of course.
I can't see why you wouldn't understand why I wouldn't write.
translation.es: No veo cómo te preguntabas por qué no te contesté.

translation.en: Foolish of me.
Why I wouldn't want anything to do with you!
translation.es: ¡Por qué no quería saber nada contigo!

translation.en: Oh, no, now…
- Don't cry. -
I just… I feel so terrible about it all.
translation.es: Es que me siento muy mal por todo eso.

translation.en: Oh, I… I didn't think…
I'm so very sorry, Rene.
There, there. Don't be.
I'm sorry too.
Oh, darn it. The truth is I'm very glad to see you, Clare.
translation.es: Rayos, la verdad es que me alegra mucho verte.

translation.en: Very.
Oh, and I you, Rene. You can't imagine.
translation.es: A mí también, Rene. No te imaginas.

translation.en: Without that day, I would've got to the end, unable to speak to anyone.
translation.es: De no haber sido por ese día, habría tenido que callarlo hasta el final.

translation.en: You can't know.
Never anyone to really talk to.
translation.es: No tengo con quién hablar en serio.

translation.en: It was insensitive of me not to think about that.
translation.es: Qué insensible fui al no pensar en eso.

translation.en: Oh, I don't expect you to understand.
You're happy.
You have a true, good life, and you're free.
translation.es: Vives bien, sin mentir y libre.

translation.en: Free and safe.
Safe.
I don't even know what that is anymore.
translation.es: Yo ya no sé lo que es eso.

translation.en: I'm beginning to believe that no one is ever completely happy, free, or safe.
translation.es: Empiezo a pensar que nadie vive feliz ni libre ni seguro del todo.

translation.en: Well, then, what does it matter if I come up here sometimes?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿qué importa si vengo de vez en cuando?

translation.en: You have a child, Clare. It's not just a matter of your safety.
translation.es: Tienes una hija, Clare. No se trata solo de tu seguridad.

translation.en: Being a mother is the cruelest thing in the world.
translation.es: Ser madre es lo más cruel del mundo.

translation.en: - Hello. Redfield residence. - Yes.
One moment…
And the most responsible.
Mr. Wentworth is on the telephone again, ma'am.
translation.es: Es el señor Wentworth otra vez, señora.

translation.en: Excuse me.
Hello?
Oh, honestly, Hugh, tell her to stop being silly. I've told you it's fine.
translation.es: En serio, Hugh, dile que no sea tonta. Te dije que no pasa nada.

translation.en: Mm- hmm. See you tomorrow.
You sound busy.
It's this Negro Welfare League dance tomorrow.
translation.es: Mañana es el baile de la Liga para el Bienestar de los Negros.

translation.en: I'm on the organizational committee. I am the committee, pretty much.
translation.es: Estoy en el comité organizador. Más bien, soy el comité.

translation.en: - Hugh Wentworth, the novelist? - Yes. Do you know him?
translation.es: - ¿Era Hugh Wentworth, el novelista? - Sí. ¿Lo conoces?

translation.en: - I've read a book or two of his. - You have?
- They're good, aren't they? - I suppose.
Sort of contemptuous.
Yes. Well, he's a dear, really.
translation.es: Sí, pero él es un encanto.

translation.en: Mind if I do some things around the house?
- I wasn't expecting guests. - Oh, I don't mind.
translation.es: - No esperaba visitas. - No me molesta.

translation.en: You can show me your home.
So, Hugh Wentworth's coming up to your dance, huh?
Yes. Why not?
Curious to me.
A man like that going to a Negro dance.
translation.es: que alguien como él vaya a un baile de negros.

translation.en: Hundreds of white people like Hugh come to affairs in Harlem now
translation.es: Cientos de blancos vienen a Harlem a estas cosas.

translation.en: - Why? - Same reason you're here. To see Negroes.
translation.es: - ¿A qué vienen? - A lo mismo que tú, a ver negros.

translation.en: What are you doing, boys?
To enjoy themselves, to get material,
translation.es: A pasarla bien, a buscar material,

translation.en: to gaze on the great and near- great as they gaze on the Negroes.
translation.es: a ver a los famosos, o casi, que vienen a ver a los negros.

translation.en: Rene, suppose I come too?
- Why, because so many white people go? - No, because it'll be fun.
translation.es: - ¿Lo dices porque vienen muchos blancos? - No, porque sería divertido.

translation.en: I don't know. What if somebody recognizes you?
I'll take my chances on getting by.
- You'll be bored stiff. - I won't, honestly. I won't.
translation.es: - Te aburrirás como una ostra. - No, en serio.

translation.en: - I won't be able to look after you. - I'll be as good as gold.
translation.es: - No podré ocuparme de ti. - Me portaré muy bien.

translation.en: I'll just sit there and gaze at the great and not- so- great.
translation.es: Me quedaré sentada, viendo a los famosos, o casi.

translation.en: Look, I don't care what you do or where you go,
translation.es: No me importa qué haces ni adónde vas.

translation.en: but I don't see why you should put yourself in a place that might bring you trouble.
translation.es: Pero ¿por qué te meterías en un lugar peligroso para ti?

translation.en: Damn John!
He gets in the way of everything I want. I could kill him.
translation.es: Se interpone en todo lo que deseo. Lo mataría.

translation.en: I wouldn't.
There's still capital punishment in this state, at least.
translation.es: Sigue habiendo pena capital, al menos en este estado.

translation.en: I want so much to be around Negroes again.
translation.es: Cuánto deseo estar con los negros,

translation.en: Talk with them, hear them laugh.
I've almost forgotten it…
Damn!
- Shall I go down? - No, it's nothing.
Zu will clean it.
Zu!
Come to the dance if you want to. I'm not going to stop you.
translation.es: Puedes ir al baile si quieres. No te lo impediré.

translation.en: Thank you, Rene. That's so kind of you. Really, thank you.
translation.es: Gracias, Rene. Eres muy amable. En serio, gracias.

translation.en: Boys?
- What do you want? We're busy. - Junior.
Oh, now, don't be cross. I know I've gone and spoiled everything,
translation.es: No se enojen. Sé que acabo de arruinar todo,

translation.en: but if I promise not to get in the way, will you let me in?
translation.es: pero les prometo que no molestaré. ¿Me dejan pasar?

translation.en: It will just be us for dinner.
It's just as well. I don't have any more for more.
translation.es: Mejor así. No alcanza para más personas.

translation.en: Well, they were the cowboys and I was the Indian,
translation.es: Ellos eran los vaqueros y yo era la indígena,

translation.en: and they captured me right outside the fort.
translation.es: me atraparon en la entrada del fuerte.

translation.en: But I think I just made my getaway.
Pay him no attention. Junior gets ahead of himself fast.
translation.es: No le hagas caso. Junior se propasa enseguida.

translation.en: Mmm. What's cooking? Yams? How you fixin' them?
- Butter, salt, sugar. Simple. - Simple!
translation.es: Con manteca, sal y azúcar. Es sencillo. ¡Sencillo! ¡Es el sabor más perfecto del planeta!

translation.en: Why, it's just about the most perfect taste on God's earth!
translation.es: ¡Sencillo! ¡Es el sabor más perfecto del planeta!

translation.en: Where did you find her, Rene?
I long for a maid who knows real home cookin'.
translation.es: Muero por una mucama que sepa cocinar así.

translation.en: - It's not like that. - Not like what?
translation.es: - No es lo que crees. - ¿Qué cosa?

translation.en: Everyone needs help. It's normal.
- Maybe next time you can stay for dinner. - Oh, please, yes.
translation.es: - La próxima vez, puedes quedarte a cenar. - Por favor, sí.

translation.en: How about I stop by tomorrow and we can go to the dance together?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si vengo mañana y vamos juntas al baile?

translation.en: All right.
- All right. See you tomorrow, then. - Tomorrow. Yes.
translation.es: - Hasta mañana, entonces. - Hasta mañana. Sí.

translation.en: - Bye, Rene. - Mm.
- All right, come on in. - I didn't get a chance yet.
- Thought you might've fallen asleep. - No. Out on time. For once.
translation.es: - Creí que ibas a estar dormida. - No, llegaste antes, por una vez.

translation.en: Ooh, good.
- You nervous? - Hey, get off. You're sitting on my dress.
translation.es: - ¿Estás nerviosa? - Párate. Me aplastas el vestido.

translation.en: - Clare's coming. Clare Bellew. - Hmm?
- That crazy woman, Clare? - Her, yes, her.
Crazy woman Clare Bellew.
- She's not crazy. - Since when?
Just… different.
She surprised me with a visit yesterday.
Yesterday? Why in the world didn't you tell me?
translation.es: ¿Ayer? ¿Por qué rayos no me lo contaste?

translation.en: - Don't know. I had a lot to think about. - Irene.
translation.es: - No sé. Tenía la cabeza en otra cosa. - Irene.

translation.en: She made it sound not such a problem if she came with us, so…
translation.es: Me convenció de que no pasaba nada si venía al baile, así que…

translation.en: I said fine.
- She's coming here? - Any minute, I would think.
translation.es: - ¿Vendrá a casa? - Debe estar por llegar.

translation.en: Be nice, huh?
I highly doubt it.
I mean, you be nice to her.
I will be polite.
Gonna dress or lie there?
Quit hovering. Go wait for me downstairs.
Wait, I'm sorry. I love you.
Boy! You are nervous.
Oh, I thought I'd never get better.
translation.es: Creí que no iba a curarme nunca.

translation.en: I had such a fever. I thought I'd die. Truly.
translation.es: Tenía tanta fiebre que pensé que me moría.

translation.en: It was quite the epidemic. I can't recall how many cases I treated.
translation.es: Fue una epidemia terrible. No recuerdo cuántos casos traté.

translation.en: - Not all of them made it. - Mmm.
- So you're lucky. - Yeah.
Of course, many more survived on my watch.
- - I'm not bragging.  And what if you are?
translation.es: - No estoy presumiendo. - ¿Y qué si lo estás?

translation.en: - It's worth bragging about if it's true. -
You may be right.
I'm sorry, I didn't realize you were here already.
translation.es: Lo siento, no sabía que habías llegado.

translation.en: Don't worry. We made our own introductions.
translation.es: No es nada, ya nos presentamos.

translation.en: Yeah, we did.
- You look lovely, Rene. - Mm- hmm.
I'm afraid I may have chosen all wrong.
translation.es: Tengo miedo de haber elegido mal.

translation.en: Rot! It's perfect.
- …do it again. - You told me.
translation.es: - Si puedo repetirlo. - Tú me lo dijiste.

translation.en: Here they are!
Well, how do I look?
- Like a princess. -
All right, all right.
- Good night and good night. - Good night.
I feel exactly as I used to the night before Christmas.
translation.es: Siento lo mismo que sentía en Nochebuena.

translation.en: I knew there was a surprise waiting for me, but I could never guess what.
translation.es: Sabía que me esperaba una sorpresa, pero no adivinaba qué.

translation.en: - Ah. - I'm so excited. - You can't possibly imagine. -
translation.es: No te imaginas qué emocionada estoy.

translation.en: - You can't possibly imagine. - Stop now.
- Hi. -
- - That music sounds good.
They'll be there.
Bianca, I am outraged.
There's Hugh!
Anywhere to sit?
In that booth with Hugh if we can get there.
translation.es: Junto a Hugh, si logramos llegar.

translation.en: What a hoot!
There he goes!
Hey, where'd you learn this dance?  You taught me everything I know.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde aprendiste a bailar? - Tú me enseñaste todo lo que sé.

translation.en: Felise, Dave!
- It's a triumph! The band is peachy! - It's a riot!
- Come on, Brian. We're going dancing. - What--
- Oh, no, no, no. - Oh, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes.
Look out, Clare. The man has two left feet.
translation.es: Cuídate, Clare. Tiene los pies cruzados.

translation.en: - Is that true? - No.
- Yes, it's very true. Bit rusty. - - Well, let's give it a go. - All right.
translation.es: - Sí, en serio. Estoy oxidado. - Intentémoslo.

translation.en: Okay.
Poor man, rich man, beggar man, thief… How's the rest of it go?
translation.es: Pobre, rico, mendigo y ladrón, ¿cómo sigue la rima?

translation.en: Doctor, lawyer, Indian chief. All here and a few more.
translation.es: Abogado, cacique y hasta el doctor. Hay de todo eso y más.

translation.en: What I'm trying to find out is the history and status
translation.es: Lo que me gustaría saber es la historia y el estado civil

translation.en: of the blonde beauty out of the fairy tale that you've brought along.
translation.es: de esa rubia preciosa de ensueño que vino con ustedes.

translation.en: See?
The one currently seen dancing with your husband.
translation.es: La que está bailando con tu esposo.

translation.en: She's a girl from Chicago I used to know. She's very excited I know you.
translation.es: Es una conocida mía de Chicago. No puede creer que yo te conozca.

translation.en: - Good of her, I'm sure. -
Can you spot my wayward wife in the throng?
translation.es: ¿Viste a mi mujer descarriada entre la turba?

translation.en: Ah, yes!
Ah. The usual problem.
All these gentlemen of color have driven a mere Nordic out of her mind.
translation.es: Todos esos señores de color eclipsaron en su mente a este pobre nórdico.

translation.en: Stop!
Have I laid eyes on her tonight except in spots here and there
translation.es: Las pocas veces que la vi esta noche, estaba girando

translation.en: being twirled about by some Ethiopian?
translation.es: de aquí para allá en brazos de un etíope.

translation.en: I have not.
Well, sir, you have to admit that the average colored man
translation.es: Debes reconocer que el hombre de color, en promedio,

translation.en: is a better dancer than the average white.
translation.es: baila mejor que el hombre blanco.

translation.en: That is if the celebrities who find their way up here
translation.es: Si es que los famosos que suelen visitarnos

translation.en: are fair specimens of your sort.
Having not tripped the light fantastic with any of the males,
translation.es: Puesto que no he salido a la pista con ningún señor,

translation.en: I am hardly in a position to argue the point.
translation.es: no me encuentro en condición de opinar.

translation.en: Bianca and Co. are always raving on
translation.es: Bianca y sus amigas viven delirando

translation.en: about the good looks of some Negro, especially an unusually dark one.
translation.es: con la belleza de los negros, sobre todo de los más oscuros.

translation.en: Like Ralph Hazelton there.
Dozens of women have declared him fantastically handsome.
translation.es: Se cuentan por docenas las mujeres que lo consideran sumamente apuesto.

translation.en: What do you think? Is he?
No. And I don't think anyone else would either.
translation.es: No. Y creo que ellas tampoco lo ven así.

translation.en: It's just plain exoticism. An interest in what's different.
translation.es: Es solo el interés por su exotismo, porque él es distinto.

translation.en: A kind of emotional excitement…
Something you feel in the presence of something strange
translation.es: Lo que se siente ante la presencia de algo extraño

translation.en: and, even perhaps, a bit repugnant to you.
translation.es: y quizá hasta un poco repugnante.

translation.en: And there you have it.
So, do you subscribe to the notion
that our motives for coming up here are predatory?
translation.es: de que venimos aquí porque somos depredadores?

translation.en: No.
More curious, I should say.
Like your princess from Chicago.
What is that supposed to mean?
Things aren't always what they seem, Hugh.
translation.es: No todo es lo que parece, Hugh.

translation.en: I'll be damned.
- Nobody could tell from looking at her. - No.
translation.es: - No se le nota a simple vista. - No.

translation.en: Most surprising.
Tell me, can you always tell the difference?
- Oh, now you really are sounding ignorant. - No, no, I mean it.
translation.es: - Ahora sí que pareces un ignorante. - No, en serio.

translation.en: Feelings of kinship or something like that?
Stop talking to me like you're writing for the National Geographic.
translation.es: Deja de hablar como si escribieras una nota de National Geographic.

translation.en: I can tell same as you.
And I suppose sometimes there is a…
translation.es: Pero creo que a veces hay

translation.en: a thing… a thing that can't be registered.
Yes, I understand what you mean.
Yet, lots of people pass all the time.
translation.es: Sí, mucha gente se hace pasar por lo que no es.

translation.en: It's easy for a Negro to pass for white.
translation.es: Para un negro es fácil pasar por blanco.

translation.en: I'm not sure it would be so simple for a white person to pass for colored.
translation.es: Pero para un blanco no es tan fácil pasar por alguien de color.

translation.en: Never thought of that.
No, Hugh. Why should you?
Sometimes I think you could.
translation.es: A veces pienso que tú podrías.

translation.en: Yes.
And in a way, if you can, why wouldn't you?
translation.es: Y si puedes, ¿por qué no probar?

translation.en: Sorry. Hey.
- I'm asking, why wouldn't you? - Who's to say I'm not?
translation.es: - Dime, ¿por qué no probaste? - ¿Quién dijo que no probé?

translation.en: - You're being unusually cryptic this-- - And you are being an ass.
translation.es: Hoy estás demasiado misteriosa. Y tú estás hecho un cretino.

translation.en: I just mean…
we're all of us passing for something or other.
translation.es: que todos nos hacemos pasar por algo.

translation.en: Aren't we?
An ass, am I?
Ah, my feet hurt like a… a marathon runner's.
translation.es: Me duelen los pies como si hubiera corrido una maratón.

translation.en: I am in awe of your energy!
Well, I suppose I ought to go retrieve my wife
translation.es: Tendré que ir a recuperar a mi esposa

translation.en: before some man or other steals her away from me indefinitely.
translation.es: antes de que otro hombre me la robe indefinidamente.

translation.en: Won't you dance with me, Mr. Wentworth?
It's not quite my strong suit, Ms. Bellew.
translation.es: Bailar no es lo mío, señorita Bellew.

translation.en: - Hugh. - Brian.
- Thank you. - And for you.
- Thank you. - Your husband has ruined me, Rene.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Tu esposo arruinó todo para mí, Rene.

translation.en: I must have another dance with him. He's the best here!
translation.es: Ahora debo bailar con él de nuevo. ¡No habrá otro mejor!

translation.en: I guess my wife hasn't told you that I do not respond well to flattery.
translation.es: Ahora debo bailar con él de nuevo. ¡No habrá otro mejor! Mi esposa te debe haber contado que no reacciono bien a los halagos.

translation.en: Uh, however, I would be more than happy
to find you a suitable replacement.
Now, this… this is your man.
- You? - Yeah.
You'll do. Come along.
- See ya. - He doesn't stand a chance.
None whatsoever.
You know, I'm rather glad she came.
translation.es: Me alegra que ella haya ido.

translation.en: Isn't she extraordinarily beautiful, though?
translation.es: ¿No crees que tiene una belleza extraordinaria?

translation.en: No, not particularly.
- You're fooling! - No.
I mean, she'd be a rather unusually good- looking white woman, I suppose.
translation.es: Reconozco que es más atractiva de lo normal para una mujer blanca,

translation.en: But personally, I like my women darker.
translation.es: pero a mí, personalmente, me gustan las mujeres más oscuras.

translation.en: - Yeah? - Mm- hmm.
Maybe it's just because she was so happy.
Irene, watch yourself.
Don't find yourself responsible for that kind of happiness.
translation.es: No te sientas responsable de semejante felicidad.

translation.en: Nonsense.
Hey, can it!
Clare?
Goin' back to bed, Mama?
No, of course not, sweetie.
- Where's Clare? - She's coming later when you'll be in bed.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde está Clare? - Viene más tarde, cuando se acuesten.

translation.en: - But she sends you special kisses. - But Pa said she'd play with me.
translation.es: - Les mandó besos. - Papá dijo que ella vendría a jugar.

translation.en: Ted, take your brother to the kitchen and get something to eat.
translation.es: Ted, lleva a tu hermano a la cocina a comer algo.

translation.en: I don't want something to eat.
- Ted, I said go take your… - 'Scuse me.
Sorry. I told Junior Clare would be here.
translation.es: Perdón, le dije a Junior que estaba Clare.

translation.en: What's that about?
Somebody called him a dirty…
translation.es: Hoy le dijeron que era un…

translation.en: you- know- what today.
translation.es: Un negro de ya sabes qué.

translation.en: - Zulena? - Out back, Rene.
What in the world? Clare, aren't you freezing?
When the Lord brings you a magical day like this, I say lap it up.
translation.es: Cuando el Señor te regala un día mágico, debes aprovechar.

translation.en: You're crazy.
- Zu, can you help with these groceries? - They call this an Indian summer.
translation.es: - Zu, ¿me ayudas con las compras? - Lo llaman veranillo.

translation.en: - An Indian summer? - Zu.
Zu and I were just talking about the Charlestons next door.
translation.es: Zu y yo hablábamos de los vecinos de al lado.

translation.en: - That eldest girl is getting so pretty. - She is.
translation.es: - La hija mayor se está poniendo hermosa. - Sí.

translation.en: Ted can barely look at her.
- Puberty makes such a mess of friendships. - Puberty is a mess!
translation.es: - La pubertad complica las amistades. - ¡La pubertad es complicada!

translation.en: Amen to that!
I don't know.
You had a lot of friends, as I recall.
I suppose.
Sometimes I wonder why we weren't better friends.
translation.es: A veces pienso por qué no éramos tan amigas.

translation.en: Oh, we did all right.
I always admired you, though.
You were always so calm and beautiful in the face of everything.
translation.es: Eras hermosa y siempre te tomabas todo con mucha calma.

translation.en: Me? Come on, now.
You were always the beauty.
Not how I see it.
Staying for dinner?
I can't.
John's coming home.
Oh, I thought next week.
Back early.
Misses me.
Can't say I feel the same. Wish he'd stay away always.
translation.es: Pero yo no siento lo mismo. Ojalá no volviera más.

translation.en: - You mustn't say that. - Mustn't I?
Still coming to bridge?
Heaven forfend I miss the bridge, Rene!
translation.es: ¡Dios me libre si me pierdo el bridge!

translation.en: It was dusky inside and smelled like wood and oil.
translation.es: Adentro estaba oscuro y olía a madera y aceite.

translation.en: She bumped her head on a light bulb dangling from the ceiling.
translation.es: Ella se chocó la cabeza contra una luz que colgaba del techo.

translation.en: Want to take the next part?
All that time, the rat steadied the bulb
translation.es: La rata sostenía la luz para que no se moviera,

translation.en: and pulled the chain, and light flickered.
translation.es: tiró de la cadena, y la luz se encendió.

translation.en: There was a lynching in Little Rock. You hear about that?
translation.es: En Little Rock hubo un linchamiento, ¿te enteraste?

translation.en: - Not now. - What happened?
A Black man was accused of assaulting two white women.
translation.es: Un hombre de color fue acusado de atacar a dos mujeres blancas.

translation.en: What did he do to them?
It's less a question of what than if, Ted.
translation.es: Pregunta si les hizo algo, Ted, no qué les hizo.

translation.en: - But they lynched the man anyway. - Exactly.
Junior, go brush your teeth.
They…
- chased him… - Brian.
They caught him, hung him from a telephone pole, and they shot him.
translation.es: Lo atraparon, lo colgaron de un poste telefónico y lo balearon.

translation.en: - But why, Papa? - Because they hate us, son.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué, papá? - Porque nos odian, hijo.

translation.en: I said, Brian, not now.
Come here.
Seems as though we can't discuss these things
translation.es: Parece que no podemos hablar de estas cosas

translation.en: without distressing the ladies of our family.
translation.es: sin alterar a las damas de la familia.

translation.en: - All right? - Yeah.
Go brush those teeth, hmm?
I know I take being a mother rather seriously.
translation.es: Sé que me tomo muy en serio mi rol de madre.

translation.en: I know I'm wrapped up in my boys and the running of my house.
translation.es: Estoy entregada al cuidado de mis hijos y de mi casa.

translation.en: But I don't think there's anything funny in that.
translation.es: Pero no le veo nada raro.

translation.en: Oh, Rene, I know.
You're so good. So perfect.
You say that like it's a bad thing.
translation.es: Lo dices como si fuera algo malo.

translation.en: Let's sit here a minute.
I like hearing him play.
Don't think, whatever happens, I'll forget how good you've been to me.
translation.es: Pase lo que pase, no creas que olvidaré lo que hiciste por mí.

translation.en: - What are you talking about? - I mean it.
You see, I…
I don't have proper morals or a sense of duty like you.
translation.es: Yo no tengo un sentido de la moral o del deber como tú.

translation.en: - You're talking nonsense. - But it's true, Rene.
translation.es: - No digas tonterías. - Pero es cierto, Rene.

translation.en: Don't you realize?
I'm not like you one bit.
translation.es: No me parezco a ti en nada.

translation.en: Why, to get the things I want so badly, I'd do anything.
translation.es: Yo haría cualquier cosa por conseguir lo que deseo.

translation.en: Hurt anybody.
Throw anything away.
Anything.
I'm not safe.
Clare, stop it.
What you're saying is wrong.
You've always had so much, you haven't given up a thing.
translation.es: Siempre tuviste tanto que no renuncias a nada.

translation.en: Clare?
Oh, I'm sorry.
Has Mae called?
I don't know where she could be.
Damn Zu taking the night off…
translation.es: Y Zu que se tomó la noche libre…

translation.en: She does have to see her family from time to time.
translation.es: Algún día tiene que ver a su familia.

translation.en: Oh, but, we're late already and…
translation.es: Pero ya se hizo tarde y…

translation.en: Well, it is my last night before I leave for Europe.
translation.es: ¡Es mi última noche antes de irme a Europa!

translation.en: Why don't I stay with the boys and you two go?
translation.es: ¿Y si me quedo yo con los niños y van ustedes?

translation.en: - Really? - I don't mind.
- No, we can't leave you. - Oh, yes, you can.
translation.es: - No, no podemos dejarte. - Sí, pueden.

translation.en: And it will make the numbers even.
Well, now I really have to play bridge.
translation.es: Bueno, ahora sí tendré que jugar al bridge.

translation.en: - Go on, now. - But I'll miss you, Rene.
translation.es: - Vete tranquila. - Pero te voy a extrañar.

translation.en: No, you won't. Go on. Get.
Go on, now.
This is where all the talent is.
- Yeah, and the hooch. -
Where's Princess tonight?
It's a rarity having the two of you all to myself.
translation.es: Es raro tenerlos todos para mí.

translation.en: She's in Europe.
Her daughter's in boarding school. Switzerland, of all places.
translation.es: La hija está en un internado. En Suiza, como si fuera poco.

translation.en: - What? - Nothing. Just, uh…
What do you know about Switzerland?
Well, I shouldn't miss her too much. I find her hard work.
translation.es: No la voy a echar de menos. Me resulta agotadora.

translation.en: Well, some would say the same of you.
translation.es: Se podría decir lo mismo de ti.

translation.en: True.
But I call it shameless, what she does. Always playing the victim.
translation.es: Pero ella es una desvergonzada. Siempre hace el papel de víctima.

translation.en: Poor little tragic me, etcetera…
translation.es: Pobre de mí y mi tragedia…

translation.en: It's a low way of making yourself popular--
translation.es: No es digno darse fama así, pero…

translation.en: - I don't think that's fair. - I didn't quite finish.
But she does maintain a certain charm.
translation.es: Pero reconozco que conserva cierto encanto.

translation.en: Hugh, you hardly know the woman.
- Since she isn't here to defend herself-- - You will?
translation.es: - No está acá para defenderse y… - ¿La defenderás tú?

translation.en: Very chivalrous of you, I'm sure.
- Afternoon, Lance. - Irene.
Have to let this dry before we attach it.
translation.es: Hay que dejarlo secar antes de colocarlo.

translation.en: This is nice, isn't it? Just us four.
- I'll make some hot chocolate. - Yes, please!
No, I want to keep talking about it.
- You two look serious. - We're talking about John Carter.
translation.es: - Qué caras serias. - Hablamos de John Carter.

translation.en: The one that got lynched in Little Rock.
translation.es: El que fue linchado en Little Rock.

translation.en: - That again? - You gotta know about these things.
translation.es: - ¿Otra vez? - Hay que saber de esas cosas.

translation.en: - Do I? - Do we have any more nuts?
- I'll see. - I want some too.
translation.es: - Voy a ver. - Yo también quiero.

translation.en: You know they did more than just shoot him.
They attached his body to a caravan, dragged it through the city.
translation.es: Lo ataron a un remolque y lo arrastraron por la ciudad.

translation.en: - Did you tell your father that? - He told me.
translation.es: - ¿Le dijiste eso a tu padre? - Él me lo dijo a mí.

translation.en: He did?
I'm old enough not to be spoken to like a child anymore.
translation.es: Ya tengo edad para que no me hablen como a un niño.

translation.en: Thank you for dinner, Mama.
I wish you wouldn't keep talking to them about all that lynching stuff.
translation.es: Quisiera que dejaras de hablarles de linchamientos y todo eso.

translation.en: Why?
There'll be time for them to learn about horrible things when they're older.
translation.es: Ya se enterarán de cosas horribles cuando crezcan.

translation.en: - Right now, they're safe. - You are absolutely wrong.
translation.es: - Ahora están a salvo. - Te equivocas.

translation.en: If you are determined to have them grow up in this damn country,
translation.es: Si estás decidida a que crezcan en este maldito país,

translation.en: the sooner they find out, the better.
translation.es: cuanto antes sepan qué enfrentarán, mejor.

translation.en: But they're happy. Why ruin that?
translation.es: Pero son felices. ¿Por qué lo quieres arruinar?

translation.en: - I want them to stay happy. - Irene.
What is the use in keeping things from them? Hmm?
We tried to keep them from hearing the word nigger.
translation.es: Intentamos ocultarles la frase negro de mierda.

translation.en: - Don't use those-- - They found out the hard way.
translation.es: - No digas… - La descubrieron del peor modo.

translation.en: You are not to talk about the race problem. I won't have it.
translation.es: No hables de raza aquí, no lo aceptaré.

translation.en: - It is my house too. They need to know-- - They don't!
translation.es: - También es mi casa. Deben saber… - ¡No!

translation.en: They do not.
I don't understand how someone as intelligent as you can be so stupid.
translation.es: No entiendo cómo alguien tan inteligente puede ser tan estúpida a la vez.

translation.en: I wanted to leave this hellish place years ago.
translation.es: Hace años quise irme de este infierno.

translation.en: I have been saying we should go away for a bit.
translation.es: Vengo diciendo que nos vayamos por un tiempo.

translation.en: But then you seemed happier having Clare around, so…
translation.es: Pero tú parecías más feliz cuando apareció Clare y…

translation.en: The hell has Clare got to do with--
Only that we would have gone on a trip but for that.
translation.es: De no ser por ella, nos habríamos ido de viaje.

translation.en: I gave up that idea because you objected…
translation.es: Renuncié a la idea porque te opusiste…

translation.en: - I never objected to having Clare-- - God damn it!
translation.es: - Nunca me opuse a que Clare… - ¡Diablos!

translation.en: Irene, I'm not talking about Clare.
translation.es: Irene, no estoy hablando de Clare.

translation.en: - It seems-- - I'm not talking about a trip!
I am talking about leaving this--
It seems to me you are a lot less content with what you've got when she's not here.
translation.es: Pareces mucho menos satisfecho con lo que tienes si ella no está.

translation.en: Not how I see it.No.
I'm getting up.
Don't worry.
- It was good of you to think to call me. - Always the attentive husband.
translation.es: - Qué bueno que se te ocurrió llamarme. - Soy un esposo atento.

translation.en: All of those people coming to tea.
translation.es: Viene toda esa gente a tomar el té.

translation.en: Thank goodness everything is ready.
translation.es: Gracias al cielo está todo listo.

translation.en: - Clare's downstairs. - Clare? How?
I didn't invite her, purposely.
translation.es: Si no la invité a propósito.

translation.en: Uh, she's been back for a while. Zu's always taking messages,
translation.es: Hace días que volvió. Dejó varios mensajes con Zu,

translation.en: and you never seem to respond.
Might a mere man ask why?
This party is for Hugh, and Hugh happens not to care a great deal for her, so…
translation.es: La fiesta es para Hugh, y a él no le cae muy bien Clare,

translation.en: I didn't ask her.
If you ask me, his dislike has less to do with her
translation.es: Para mí, esa antipatía tiene menos que ver con ella

translation.en: and more to do with the attention she happens to not give him very much of.
translation.es: y más con la atención que ella no le dispensa a él.

translation.en: - You love Hugh. - I do.
translation.es: - Tú lo quieres a Hugh. - Sí.

translation.en: But you'll admit he has a godlike opinion of himself.
translation.es: Pero reconozcamos que se cree Dios.

translation.en: I disagree.
He thinks far better of himself than that.
translation.es: Se cree muchísimo mejor que Dios.

translation.en: Brian?
I'm sorry. It's my fault, Irene.
She seemed hurt at being left out. I told her I was sure you'd forgotten.
translation.es: La vi sufriendo por sentirse excluida y le dije que te habrías olvidado.

translation.en: But, Brian, I…
You spoke to her, then?
Yes.
Of course you did.
In spite of what I said, Clare does add to any party.
translation.es: A pesar de lo que dije, Clare mejora todas las fiestas.

translation.en: She's so easy on the eyes.
translation.es: Es un deleite para la vista.

translation.en: You won't be long?
- Thank you. - Sorry.
We're all discussing La Josephine. You've seen her, I presume?
translation.es: Hablábamos de La Josephine. Imagino que la has visto.

translation.en: - Josephine Baker? No, never. - You're missing out.
translation.es: - ¿A Josephine Baker? No, nunca. - Tú te la pierdes.

translation.en: She may have been in Shuffle Along when I saw it,
translation.es: Tal vez actuó en Shuffle Along cuando vi la obra,

translation.en: but I can't remember.
I much prefer her to Ethel Waters.
translation.es: Me gusta mucho más que Ethel Waters.

translation.en: Ethel Waters is awfully good.
Hello, Felise, so glad you made it.
Oh, come back. Irene.
- You haven't sat down all afternoon. -
translation.es: No te has sentado en toda la tarde.

translation.en: I wanna talk to you.
Come out of it, whatever it is. You look like the second gravedigger.
translation.es: Sal de ese estado, pareces el sepulturero de Hamlet.

translation.en: I'm not quite feeling up to par.
- The weather, I guess. - Buy yourself an expensive frock.
translation.es: - Debe ser este tiempo. - Cómprate un vestido caro, linda.

translation.en: It always helps.
I have been trying to get her alone all afternoon. Clare!
translation.es: Llevo toda la tarde intentando hablar a solas con ella. ¡Clare!

translation.en: You look too divine, sitting so quiet like a painting!
translation.es: Estás preciosa, sentada ahí como un cuadro.

translation.en: - Come over for a gathering next month. - You must!
translation.es: - Ven a casa el mes próximo. - ¡Ven!

translation.en: I was telling Dave I just finished his book.
translation.es: Le contaba a Dave que acabo de leer su libro.

translation.en: - You've read his books? - Of course, I've read all of 'em!
So sorry, Rene, I must've pushed you. Clumsy of me.
translation.es: Perdón, Rene, creo que te empujé. Qué torpeza.

translation.en: Don't tell me, it's priceless and irreplaceable?
translation.es: No me digas que es invaluable e irremplazable.

translation.en: No, you didn't push me, I'm quite sure.
translation.es: No, no me empujaste, estoy segura.

translation.en: That pot was the ugliest thing
translation.es: Esa tetera era el objeto más feo

translation.en: that your ancestors, the charming Confederates, ever owned.
translation.es: que hayan poseído tus ancestros, los adorables confederados.

translation.en: I've forgotten how many thousands of years ago it was
translation.es: No recuerdo cuántos miles de años hace

translation.en: that Brian's great- great- great- great uncle owned it…
translation.es: que fue propiedad del tío tatarabuelo de Brian…

translation.en: What I mean is I never figured out how to get rid of it till just this minute.
translation.es: Quiero decir que hasta este instante no se me ocurría cómo deshacerme de ella.

translation.en: Inspiration! I had only to break it, and I was free of it forever.
translation.es: ¡Y vino la inspiración! Tenía que romperla para librarme de ella.

translation.en: - Simple. - Well done.
- My lovely. - Oh, that was wonderful.
Well done.
Brian, thank you so much for a tea party that…
translation.es: Brian, muchas gracias por esta fiesta…

translation.en: - Bye, Rene. - …can never be matched.
- Staying for dinner? - Oh, I can't tonight.
translation.es: - ¿Te quedas a cenar? - Hoy no puedo.

translation.en: Oh. Right. Too bad. Brian's got work, anyway.
translation.es: Bueno. Qué lástima. Brian tiene que trabajar.

translation.en: - So glad to see you. - So long.
Thank you so much. We had a marvelous time.
translation.es: Muchas gracias. La pasamos de maravillas.

translation.en: Good to see you. Thank you.
- Then I beat Patrick in a race. - Hat! Hat!
translation.es: - Y le gané una carrera a Patrick. - ¡El sombrero!

translation.en: Race you up the steps! Can't catch me.
I'm not letting you have it. No!
Evening.
My goodness.
- Heavens, my eyes are watering. - I fear my fingers might fall off.
translation.es: - Cielos, me lloran los ojos. - Se me van a caer los dedos.

translation.en: - - This wind is brutal!
Excuse me.
Oh, Mrs. Redfield! How do you do?
That was abrupt.
You just passed the only person I ever met while disguised as a white woman.
translation.es: Acabas de pasar junto a la única persona que conocí estando disfrazada de blanca.

translation.en: Hello, Central Quincy 5- 4- 7- 3.
Hello, is Mrs. Bellew in? It's urgent.
translation.es: Hola, ¿está la señora Bellew? Es urgente.

translation.en: No?
Never mind.
It isn't that urgent.
I'll try again later.
Irene.
Irene.
What are you doing? It's freezing.
Are we going to that party with Clare?
Have you ever been up to the sixth floor?
Of course! My father was a janitor.
Back in the old days when every ramshackle apartment had its own elevator.
translation.es: En los tiempos en que cualquier edificio de mala muerte tenía ascensor.

translation.en: Elevator?
- Oh, you can't mean we have to walk up? - All the way to the top.
translation.es: - No me digas que hay que ir por escalera. - Hasta arriba de todo.

translation.en: Oh, Lord!
Why on earth would anyone live here?
translation.es: ¿A quién se le ocurre vivir aquí?

translation.en: She says it discourages the casual visitor.
translation.es: Dice que desalienta a las visitas imprevistas.

translation.en: - Says she'd rather be dead than bored! - Huh.
Damn these thin shoes.
What is it, Rene?
Have you ever thought of what you'd do if John found out?
translation.es: ¿Nunca pensaste qué harías si John te descubriera?

translation.en: Yes.
Don't fall by the wayside before the fourth floor.
translation.es: No se rindan antes del cuarto piso.

translation.en: I absolutely refuse to carry anybody up more than two flights.
translation.es: No pienso cargar a nadie más de dos pisos.

translation.en: And? What would you?
I'd do what I want more than anything right now.
translation.es: Haría lo que más quiero en este momento.

translation.en: I'd come up here to live.
In Harlem. With you.
Lord.
Come on, slowpoke.
…dinner at Eddie's, then Leroy's, then Smalls.
translation.es: …cenar en Eddie's, luego al club de Leroy y a Smalls.

translation.en: Those dancers seem strange to anyone else?
translation.es: ¿A nadie le parecen raras esas bailarinas?

translation.en: - No, honey, just the liquor. - That's why I've given it up.
translation.es: - No, es el alcohol. - Por eso lo dejé.

translation.en: - Since this morning? - Yes.
And nothing in the least exciting has happened--
translation.es: Y no ha pasado nada emocionante…

translation.en: - You're welcome. - Thank you.
I wouldn't. I've heard the drinks here aren't safe.
translation.es: Yo no aceptaría. Parece que aquí hay bebidas raras.

translation.en: Irene, have you taken a vow not to laugh again?
translation.es: Irene, ¿has hecho una promesa de no reírte más?

translation.en: No. It's simply the rest of you are so clever, I'm speechless.
translation.es: No, solo que todos ustedes son tan listos que me dejan muda.

translation.en: You haven't a drink. What will you take?
translation.es: No tienes nada de beber. ¿Qué quieres?

translation.en: Ginger ale and three drams of scotch.
translation.es: Ginger-ale y un toque de whisky.

translation.en: Scotch first, then the ice, then the ginger ale.
translation.es: Whisky, hielo y después el ginger-ale.

translation.en: Don't attempt to mix that yourself, Dave, honey.
translation.es: Que ni se te ocurra prepararlo tú, Dave.

translation.en: - Have the butler make it. - And the footman, would you?
translation.es: - Llama al mayordomo. - Y agrega al lacayo.

translation.en: - Yes, it's a perfect evening. - Good.
Don't stand there. Aren't you freezing?
Come. Come talk to me, or at least listen to me gabble.
translation.es: Vamos. Habla conmigo, o al menos escucha mi cháchara.

translation.en: - Evening, can I help you? - Let me in.
translation.es: - Hola, ¿qué se le ofrece? - Quiero pasar.

translation.en: Perhaps you've come to the wrong house.  I know where I am. Let me in.
translation.es: - Debe haberse equivocado de casa. - Sé dónde estoy. Déjeme pasar.

translation.en: Which apartment are you looking for, sir?
- My wife is in there. - Your wife?
No, sir, she's not here. I guarantee it.
translation.es: No, señor. No está. Se lo aseguro.

translation.en: - Excuse me, I think you're wrong. - I'm not wrong.
translation.es: - Perdón, creo que se equivocó. - No me equivoqué.

translation.en: - Do not come in! - Sir, calm down.
- What's going on? - Out of my way.
Can I help you?
I've been to the Redfields' and I know she's with them.
translation.es: Fui a la casa de los Redfield y sé que está con ellos.

translation.en: Ralph, where's my drink?
Save yourself the trouble and get out of my way.
translation.es: Evítese un problema y déjeme pasar.

translation.en: I know what you're doing here. I know.
translation.es: Sé lo que hacen aquí. Lo sé.

translation.en: I'm Redfield. What the devil's the matter--
You don't get to tell me what to do! Any of you people!
translation.es: ¡No recibo órdenes de ninguno de ustedes!

translation.en: It's best you leave.
You liar!
Careful. You're the only white man here.
translation.es: Cuidado. Es el único hombre blanco que hay aquí.

translation.en: You dirty liar.
- Good Lord Jesus! -
- Hurry. - Quickly!
Quickly!
Go downstairs.
Her husband's just sitting there?
I don't know.
You don't know?  I don't know for sure if she's dead.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo que no sabes? - No sé si está muerta.

translation.en: I imagine he was just trying to protect his wife.
translation.es: Supongo que solo quería proteger a su esposa.

translation.en: Doesn't strike me as particularly unusual.
Is she…
Is she…
Irene, you mustn't.
You'll make yourself sick.
I mean, she just tumbled over and was gone.
Irene was there beside her, weren't you?  This lady here?
You're sure she fell?
Her husband didn't give her a shove or anything,
translation.es: ¿No la empujó el esposo ni nada,

translation.en: as Dr. Redfield here seems to think?
No. I'm quite sure she just fell before anyone could stop her.
translation.es: No. Estoy segura de que se cayó, y nadie pudo sujetarla.

translation.en: It was so quick, I…
- Careful. - Anyone else notice anything?
translation.es: - Cuidado. - ¿Alguno de los demás vio algo?

translation.en: - You mustn't. - None of you saw how she fell?
translation.es: - No mires. - ¿Nadie vio cómo se cayó?

translation.en: - He was upset, that's true. - So an accident?
translation.es: - Él estaba alterado, eso sí. - ¿Fue un accidente?

translation.en: I guess an accident, yeah.
That's what I thought.
I love you.
Death by misadventure, I'm inclined to believe.
translation.es: Deduzco que fue una muerte accidental.

translation.en: Let's go up and have a look at that window.
translation.es: Vayamos arriba a revisar esa ventana.
